events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer has reported a refund request for a purchased item that does not fit.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can assist you better?
Sure, my order number is 45278. The jacket is too small and the sleeves are shorter than described on the website.
Thank you for the details. We can start your refund process right away once you send the jacket back to us with the prepaid return label.
That sounds good, I will print the return label and send the jacket back today. Thanks for your help!
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for handling this quickly and professionally.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on your recent customer support experience.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey and rated the support experience as excellent.
The refund case has been closed after confirmation of refund receipt and positive customer feedback.
The refund support case has been archived in the system for future reference.
